dublin_core.dcvalue: Project Optimize is an SMS based remote temperature monitoring system for cold chain equipment to ensure vaccine quality. The software was implemented in 24 health centers in Albania over a 10 month period.
facility-based Health worker, Clinics,district managers, Facility-Based Health care worker, National health system
Jan Frevendonk, Technical Officer, WHO, Email: grevendonkj@who.int
The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation
data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, sensors and point-of-care diagnostics, Child Health
